{{ddcl | since=reflection_ts | header=experimental/reflect | 1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
concept Constant = ScopeMember&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; Typed&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; /* see below */;
}}

The {{tt|Constant}} concept is satisfied if and only if {{tt|T}} reflects a [[cpp/language/constant_expression|constant expression]].
